attributes.action: Request Sir Thomas Legg to review MP's expenses again using the correct criteria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MP's expenses should be reviewed on the basis of were they genuinely for expenses "wholly, exclusively and necessarily" incurred in carrying out their MPs duties.
Where this is not proven then repayment and reporting to the DPP / Police for prosecution for fraud should immediately be put in place. Any MP shown to have claimed item or monies which cannot be justified should also be deselected by all political parties.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
